participant_1.background:
I love to cut down trees.
I am a lumberjack.
I cut down trees very fast , because i have a large ax.
I eat lots of pancakes and syrup.
I love to fish.

participant_2.background:
I have two dogs.
I work as a secretary at an insurance agency.
I am close to both of my brothers.
I travel every year to disney world.

content.text: Hello, my name is Jack. I am a lumberjack and I love to cut down trees. Do you know anything about my work?

Hello Jack, nice to meet you. I am a secretary at an insurance agency. I know that lumberjacks are in charge of cutting down trees. I think it is a dangerous job but it is also very important. I don't know much about it but I would love to learn more.

It is a dangerous job but it is also very rewarding. I love the feeling of working outside and being able to see the results of my work. I also love the challenge of working in a team and solving problems together.

That sounds like a really interesting job. I am glad that you enjoy it so much. I know that my brother has always wanted to be a lumberjack. Maybe I can ask him more about it the next time I talk to him.
That would be great! I am always happy to talk about my job and I am sure your brother would be interested in hearing more about it.
Thank you for the conversation Jack. I have learned a lot about lumberjacks today. I hope you have a great day.
You too! It was nice talking to you.
